title: Simple Chicken Mayo with Parmesan and Bread Crumbs

Ingredients.3: 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 2 tablespoons bread crumbs, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Place chicken breasts in a baking pan.

Directions.2: Mix Parmesan cheese and mayonnaise together in a bowl until well combined; spread evenly over chicken breasts. Coat with bread crumbs and sprinkle with herbes de Provence.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken breasts are no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 20 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
